thread.title: Sanders, Burton, Shepp named 2016 NEA Jazz Masters
thread.title_full: Sanders, Burton, Shepp named 2016 NEA Jazz Masters

title: Sanders, Burton, Shepp named 2016 NEA Jazz Masters
text:
> Entertainment Sanders, Burton, Shepp named 2016 NEA Jazz Masters FILE - In this May 2, 2014 file photo, Pharoah Sanders performs at the 2014 New Orleans Jazz & Heritage Festival in New Orleans. Sanders, along with fellow saxophonist Archie Shepp and vibraphonist Gary Burton, are the newest recipients of the 2016 Jazz Masters. The awards will be presented on April 4, 2016 at a concert at the Kennedy Center. (Photo by John Davisson/Invision/AP, File)
